Interface ICmd2LocalSystemAdapter

The adapter from the command to the local system (aka model). The functions in here are the actions that the local system guarantees are possible to the foreign command.

Namespace:
Assembly: .dll
Syntax
public interface ICmd2LocalSystemAdapter

Methods

addComponent(Supplier<JComponent> componentSupplier)

The local system will install a given JComponent into the mini-MVC.

Declaration
public abstract void addComponent(Supplier<JComponent> componentSupplier)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Supplier<JComponent> componentSupplier
  • the JComponent to install.

writeError(String error)

The local system will output an error to the Logger.

Declaration
public abstract void writeError(String error)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String error
  • the error to display.

The local system displays a given Image on the chatroom

Declaration

Parameters

The local system displays a given string on the chatroom.
